title: Projects
description: Represents a collection of epics and projects that were a part of said epics.

epic.title: Epic
epic.description: a large undertaking that encompasses multiple projects

id.description: an identifier for the epic; A Simple Icons slug might be preferable.

url.description: the public-facing URL to access the epic

projects.description: an array of the epic's constitutent projects

project.title: Project
project.description: an endeavour that forms a part of a larger epic

url.description: the public-facing URL to access the project

summary.description: a short description and introduction of the project

highlights.description: a collection of salient features of the projects, as bullet points

role.description: the part played by the person in the development of the project

technologies.description: the languages, tools or frameworks used in the developement of the project

period.description: the time duration during which the project was created and maintained

examples.name: Réschumé
examples.summary: A comprehensive schema for documenting résumés.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: a language, tool or framework used in the development of a project

id.description: an identifier for the technology; A Simple Icons slug might be preferable.

name.description: the proper name of the technology
